author: mturk
msg: 1. Change the default logger to the jk2.log (was mod_jk.log)
3. Do not close log file if it is stderr.

author: mturk
msg: Fix the apr_socket default timeout value.
Also fix the send/recv that caused wrong header readings.

author: billbarker
msg: Use Craig's URL class to from the redirect request.
This gives us normalisation as well as freeing us from unwanted protocols.

author: billbarker
msg: Change the URL from Java's to Craig's.
This means that we don't need a protocol handler for whichever protocol we get asked to deal with (e.g. https).

author: costin
msg: A fix in the object name ( ',' needs to be used as separator ).
Also added unregister - need for reloads.
